trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around April 16th 2013
Summary: At least 6 orange orbs in sky ,following in slow order
divs: Sighting DetailsOn our lawn, my son called out to me,I looked out window and could see orange orb. Ran out and note Iced they were following each other every mile or so. They were not flyin low,and seemed to be in no hurry. As they passed towards north ,as I followed path towards back of house they were dimming and fading,then disappeared.
